title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: An epic open-world RPG set in a dark fantasy universe. Geralt of Rivia, a professional monster hunter, embarks on a journey to find his adopted daughter.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world action RPG set in the dark future of Night City. Customize your character and explore a futuristic metropolis full of possibilities.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: An epic open-world adventure in the land of Hyrule. Link awakens from a 100-year slumber to defeat Calamity Ganon and save Hyrule.

title: God of War
description: Kratos embarks on a dangerous journey with his son Atreus through Norse mythology. A mature reimagining of the famous action series.

title: Halo Infinite
description: Master Chief's latest adventure in the Halo saga. Explore the semi-open world of Zeta Halo and fight against the Banished.

title: Elden Ring
description: An open-world action RPG created by FromSoftware and George R.R. Martin. Explore the Lands Between and become the Elden Lord.

title: Spider-Man: Miles Morales
description: Miles Morales takes up the mantle of Spider-Man in New York during winter. An emotional story about coming of age and responsibility.

title: Minecraft
description: An open-world sandbox building and survival game. Build, explore, survive and create in infinite procedurally generated worlds.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: An open-world action-adventure game that follows three criminals and their efforts to commit heists under pressure from a corrupt government agency.

title: Fortnite
description: A free-to-play battle royale game where 100 players fight to be the last survivor. Build, fight and survive on an ever-changing island.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II
description: The return of the Modern Warfare saga with next-generation graphics and immersive gameplay. A cinematic single-player campaign and competitive multiplayer.

title: Super Mario Odyssey
description: Mario embarks on a massive 3D adventure across various kingdoms to save Princess Peach from her forced marriage to Bowser.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An epic tale of life and loyalty at the end of the outlaw era. Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang struggle to survive in a world that no longer wants them.

title: FIFA 24
description: The newest edition of the famous football simulation series, featuring HyperMotionV technology and the most popular game modes.

title: Baldur's Gate 3
description: An epic RPG based on the D&D universe. Gather your party, return to the Forgotten Realms, and embark on a journey of friendship, betrayal, sacrifice, survival, and the lure of absolute power.
